title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: 200204181. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
EB: When a working set is removed, the package view does not update and continues to show the filtered results.
SR: 200204181. Create a working set with one project and select it. Ensure that the package view is filtered. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set.
